description: The word is imitative of the bird's call.

entries.meaning: (chiefly New Zealand) The Tasmanian spotted owl (Ninox novaeseelandiae), a small brown owl indigenous to New Zealand and Tasmania. [from 19th c.]

definitionGroups.group: (Australia, New Zealand, colloquial, derogatory) Used as a mild term of abuse.

entries.meaning: A foolish person; also, a person who is wearisome.
A person who is lazy or slow; a slowcoach, a slowpoke.
